 ∙ The remaining half should be divided into two equal ¼th parts.
 ∙ The ¼ portion of the plate can be filled with protein rich food like dal, soy nuggets, tofu, eggs, paneer, 
chicken, fish etc.
 ∙ The remaining ¼ can be filled with chapati, brown rice, bread, cereals etc.
